items.title: M.S. in Computer Science
items.summary: Pursuing masters while working full-time as a software engineer.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.summary: Lead development of VOIP Architecture v1.0 for Lockheed Martin's 5G.MIL program. Responsible for system and software architecture design for the 5th Gen Crewed-Uncrewed Teaming program, collaborating across multiple teams and companies to design robust platform communication architecture. Conducting research in AI methods to improve network performance benchmarks in large FANET networks.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
items.summary: Implemented upgrades to S3 MinIO file service, adding HTTPS support and improving performance. Used OpenSSL, Nginx, AWS SDK and MinIO to achieve 86% faster HTTPS-supported file upload speeds compared to previous system iterations.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
items.summary: Developed web scraper tool using NLTK and Beautiful Soup for analyzing player injuries, capable of processing hundreds of articles to generate injury reports in minutes. Maintained and updated World Baseball Classic Website and Database using Ruby on Rails, deployed on Heroku.

items.title: B.S. in Artificial Intelligence
items.summary: Graduated with Bachelors Degree in Artifical Intelligence with University Honors. In addition to my undergraduate studies I was also a member of the Alpha Sigma Phi Fraternity and multiyear all conference football player
